website_summaries.verdict: Hunters and rural homeowners appreciate this large can of pepper spray. Contains UV marking dye for suspect identification.
pros: Contains a generous amount of high-potency spray — enough to deter wild animals and burglars
cons: Can’t be carried on the body for personal protection
Legal for home defense use only

customer_reviews.title: I could stop a small gang of thugs with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I could stop a small gang of thugs with this bottle. Used Fox Labs for years with dependable assurance I am safe as are my family members. Everybody has their own small bottle with holster everywhere they venture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great company with great products, fast delivery and outstanding customer service. Product works as advertised. Also product weight is 12oz NOT 16oz, but still the same great pepper spray...Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: great stuff. keeps my mother in law at least ...
customer_reviews.text: great stuff. keeps my mother in law at least 25 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crispino

customer_reviews.title: ***Powerful-***
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for something for security this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Charles M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Love it Comes in handy if your doing ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love it Comes in handy if your doing security work
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: this is the next best thing to protect her
customer_reviews.text: If you're spouse won't use a gun, this is the next best thing to protect her! When you have a late night break in it's better to have something.
customer_reviews.author: John Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Insane bottle
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is insane I was showing my mother how to spray it then I walked away to get a Beer came back outside inhaled damn near tripped out couldn't breath stuff burns
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like the pic! Perfect pistole grip! Feels good in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Eulisses Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: It works!! Saved our lives.
customer_reviews.text: 100% works. Probably saved our lives. Disbursed about 12 people actively jumping someone. They were beating the crap out of the guy and more were coming. One tried To take it from me and bc of the pistol grip he couldn’t and he got a mouth full. Then the rest and that was it. The stream is great & very on point. I’m very appreciative for This product. Total great home defense that won’t kill anyone
customer_reviews.author: Bruja bee

customer_reviews.title: Run up get done up
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy but works great on protestors. A+++ product. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: D-Bo

product_meta.title: Fox Labs 5.3 Million SHU UV Marking 1 lb. Pistol Grip Safety Pin Pepper Spray
product_meta.description: 5.3 Million SHU (Scoville Heat Units) - Police Strength, World's Hottest Pepper Spray Used by Police, Law Enforcement, Security, and Military agencies worldwide Contains 50+ one-second bursts Heavy fog range is 20+ feet Gun handle has a safety pin to avoid accidental discharge Contains marking UV Dye for assailant identification Non-flammable - TASER/ECD compatible Born-on-date stamped on each container 3 year shelf life Measures 9" T x 5 1/2" D Note: Born-on-date signifies that the spray will expire 3 years from that date This Fox Pepper Spray delivers police-strength damage with 5.3 Million SHU (Scoville Heat Units), and each spray produces a heavy fog up to 20+ feet. This product features a gun handle with a safety pin for additional safety precaution. The 1 lb. canister contains 50+ one-second bursts, making this a powerful tool to have on you at all times. Each spray also emits a UV dye that marks your assailant for easy identification. This pepper spray is three (3) times more effective than other sprays sold on the market, making it the top choice for all law enforcement personnel. This product has a 3-year shelf life; find the manufacture date on each canister, measuring 9" by 5.5".
feature_bullets: 5.3 Million SHU (Scoville Heat Units) - Police Strength, World's Hottest Pepper Spray
Gun handle has a safety pin to avoid accidental discharge
Note: Born-on-date signifies that the spray will expire 3 years from that date
